body.bibl: Haar Romeny, Robert Bas ter. “Techniques of Translation and Transmission in the Earliest Text Forms of the Syriac Version of Genesis.” In The Peshitta as a Translation: Papers Read at the II Peshitta Symposium Held at Leiden, 19–21 August 1993, edited by Piet B.
